page.title: 09Markets in Wembley
page.content:
There are two markets in our area, both are called 'Wembley Market'.
The first market is near {Wembley {Stadium.}It is very big and only opens on Sundays. It is in the open air in the stadium car park. They sell all kinds of things there like toys, sweets,clothes and snacks and many people go there.
The other market is near Wembley High Road. It is a small covered market open every day. They sell mostly fruit, vegetables,sweets and clothes.They have just modernized it recently but few people go there at the moment.
